# LULC Brazil maps

<img src=".github/images/restoreplus_sticker.png" alt="Restore+ icon" align="right" height="150" width="150"/>

  <!-- badges: start -->
  <!-- badges: end -->

This repository hosts official releases of the **Land Use and Land Cover (LULC) Brazil maps** produced as part of the *Restore+ Project*.
